meanings.sent1: The wowing magic show left the audience amazed.
meanings.sent2: She gave a wowing performance on stage.
meanings.sent3: The wowing fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The wowing sunset painted the horizon in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: His wowing skills on the guitar captivated everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: the act of impressing or exciting someone greatly
meanings.sent1: The wowing of the crowd was evident after the singer's performance.
meanings.sent2: Her wowing of the judges secured her a spot in the finals.
meanings.sent3: The wowing of the guests at the party made it a memorable event.
meanings.sent4: The wowing of the audience was the highlight of the show.
meanings.sent5: His wowing of the critics with his latest film earned him praise.
